text: I purchased a pair of shoes that came with a grey mark. When I contacted StockX they said this was 'normal and passable'. i will not be returning and do not recommend anyone else trust their obviously faulty QA mechanisms.

author: Adam
text:
Wish I had read more reviews before starting to use StockX. Ordered Nike Challenger OGs (fortunately just after everyday trainers) but the white tick had a yellow discolouration. No idea how this passed 'quality control' or if just simply shines a light on how bad a check they actually do or they actually have low standards. I wouldn't wear these and if tried to sell on eBay or elsewhere any buyer would no doubt, rightfully, complain. StockX thought free shipping on my next purchase. Firstly this c£15 offer is nowhere near sufficient, and secondly wrongly assumes that I will ever use StockX again. Unfortunately I recently ordered Patent Bred's so again at the mercy of StockX's so-called quality control. Wish I hadn't now. 

If you are buying from StockX to guarantee you receive authentic and 'new' condition trainers then please manage your expectations as whilst I'm sure most are absolutely fine, for me personally I don't intend on taking another risk.

UPDATE FOLLOWING RESPONSE - your own FAQs cite 5 years as when a customer should expect some level of aging, however these were released June 2020 - so not even 2 years old. Surely that should have been indication that they are either not authentic to show aging so soon or that the seller is selling damaged items that cant be classed as like new' as the product description listed on your website used to entice a purchase includes.

StockX is clearly a site for protecting seller's and not purchases as the 'authentication stage' clearly isnt fit for purpose and from my own experience, and evidently based on other reviews, neither is the customer service department.
title: Bad quality 'quality testing'

author: John
text: Was $50 more than the price after fees and took over a week longer than expected to deliver.
title: Was $50 more than the price after fees…

author: Michelle Evans
text: Horrible Horrible service. Too many steps. Additional Fees...After waiting the shoe was finally authenticated. I thought the next step would be to ship. Checked on status..Nothing at all. Then received an email msg that order was canceled after waiting over a week. Speechless. Just Horrible service.
title: Horrible Horrible service

author: Summer Phillips
text: If you like customer service and being able to talk to someone if there’s a problem with your order… THIS ISNT FOR YOU! For the price if these shoes I want to be able to speak with a live person. My daughter ordered the wrong size and their response was of course to resell them on their site and take a hit… no thanks!
title: If you like customer service and being…
